artist: Artist: Caroline Paquita-Kern; Publisher: Pegacorn Press
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, illustration of a woman with three eyes reading into a crystal ball, printed using a risograph on beige wove paper covers; 28 pp.
title: Womanimalisti #3: Phoenix Burning, Phoenix Rising
